result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lamonte A Weathers

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lamonte A Weathers appeared by video.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty appeared by video for Lamonte A Weathers.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case in court for status conference.
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review. 
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 15.
Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report, filed.
signed and filed

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Lamonte A Weathers.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a bail/bond hearing. Defense makes an oral motion to amend the No Contact Order to a No Violent Contact Order. Arguments heard. State does not object. Court modifies the No Contact Order with KB to a No Violent Contact Order. Defense to submit a proposed order to the court. Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Report Received and Filed.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($200.00 signature bond) LW

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Lamonte A Weathers.  Prosecuting attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.
Scheduling conference held. Defense needs an offer and is requesting a bail review. Case is adjourned in Branch 15.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Previous no contact order with Krystal D.B is continued by the court.

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Fred Richardson III appeared by video for Lamonte A Weathers.  Attorney Michael J. Odden appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge J.D. Watts, Branch 15.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 15.
This hearing MAY be streamed live on Dacast:https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/104d9737-ba2f-8811-9083-aed2135824d9
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 200.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Matter scheduled for Status of Counsel.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court further orders that bail is forfeited.
JOEL MOGREN.
Status conference on August 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers in court.  Julie D Knyszek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/ LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST. Case in court for pretrial conference. 
Court instructed defendant to contact to the Public Defender Office to be evaluated for appointment of counsel. 
Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.
Court ordered case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on July 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Discharge Report
Pretrial Services Violation Report
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Krystal D.B.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers in court with attorney Connor Romenesko.  Defendant Lamonte A Weathers in custody.  Alicia H Kort appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Lamonte A Weathers appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial.  
This hearing may be streamed live through DACAST at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE ARREST WARRANT.

Defendant Lamonte A Weathers not in court.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered an Arrest Warrant to be issued. Upon arrest, defendant is ordered remanded to a commissioner. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited. Court makes a finding that there is a possible victim identified and stays the forfeiture order with restitution to be determined at close of case.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/8/22 @ 2p
